Passenger

Interface IPassengerGenRep

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGenRep
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MGeneralRepository

    public interface IPassengerGenRep
    Interface for communications between a Passenger and the General Repository
    Author:
    Filipe Teixeira , Miguel Azevedo

    • Method Detail

      • registerPassenger

        void registerPassenger(int passengerNumber,
                     int flightNumber,
                     boolean inTransit,
                     int remainingBags)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Registers the passenger.
        Parameters:
        passengerNumber - The id of this passenger
        flightNumber - The number of the flight this passenger is in
        inTransit - True if the passenger is in transit
        remainingBags - The number of the bags the passenger has
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
